includedAssets.title: Hotel Transylvania
includedAssets.synopsis: Hotel Transylvania is the perfect place for monsters to escape the human world, until an unwitting hitchhiker tries to check in. Animated fun with the voice of Adam Sandler.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hotel Transylvania is the perfect place for monsters to escape the human world, until an unwitting hitchhiker tries to check in. Animated fun.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hotel Transylvania is the perfect place for monsters to escape the human world, until an unwitting hitchhiker tries to check in. Animated fun with the voice of Adam Sandler.

includedAssets.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Dracula recruits his friends to help bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson. Animated sequel with the voice of Adam Sandler.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dracula recruits his friends to help bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson. Animated sequel with the voice of Adam Sandler.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dracula recruits his friends to help bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson. Animated sequel with the voice of Adam Sandler.

includedAssets.title: Hotel Transylvania 1-2
includedAssets.synopsis: Count Dracula (Adam Sandler) owns and manages a secluded and secretive hotel for the world’s monsters as a safe haven, away from the dangerous humans. Animated family comedy also starring Selena Gomez, Andy Samberg, Kevin James, Steve Buscemi and David Spade.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dracula (Adam Sandler) runs a hotel for the world’s monsters as a refuge from the vicious humans. Animated family comedy also starring Selena Gomez.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Count Dracula (Adam Sandler) owns and manages a secluded and secretive hotel for the world’s monsters as a safe haven, away from the dangerous humans. Animated family comedy also starring Selena Gomez, Andy Samberg, Kevin James, Steve Buscemi and David Spade.

includedIn.title: Hotel Transylvania
includedIn.synopsis: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, the perfect place for monsters to escape the human world. But can Dracula and co really keep people out of their hotel hideaway?
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania - where monsters go to escape the human world. But can Dracula and co really keep people out of their hotel hideaway?
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, the perfect place for monsters to escape the human world. But can Dracula and co really keep people out of their hotel hideaway?

title: Hotel Transylvania 1-2 Box Set
synopsis: Count Dracula (Adam Sandler) owns and manages a secluded and secretive hotel for the world's monsters as a safe haven, away from the dangerous humans. Animated family comedy also starring Selena Gomez, Andy Samberg, Kevin James, Steve Buscemi and David Spade.
